name: rubidium dawn
description:
FOR BEST RESULTS PLEASE USE A CONTROLLER

a starfox 64-inspired rails shooter. made as game 4 of my ongoing "10 games in 10 weeks" challenge. finished a couple days late.

(rubidium dawn is the name of the ship)

ship model by kenney :) https://kenney.nl/

textures and monster sounds from librequake https://github.com/MissLav/LibreQuake

monster sprites from dungeon crawl stone soup https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles-supplemental
